extendedInfo.description: In God we trust!Are you proud to be Christian? This Christian Wallpaper app is totally FREE. Show your trust in God using this awesome Christian wallpapers app. Now with 30+ wallpapers inside the application.**************************************Application will show ad every day from LeadBolt in the notification bar. This is to support the development for this and other apps. If you really don't like leadBolt you can opt-out.(https://market.android.com/details?id=com.leadbolt.optout).Please don't give us a star for this and don't uninstall it. If you don't want to support us with ads you can simply opt-out. Thanks********************

reviews.title: no
reviews.comment: Content was not great and the ads were more than annoying.
reviews.author: Allie Hines
